templates.title: Homarr v1
templates.name: homarr-v1
templates.description: Homarr v1 - A sleek, modern dashboard for your server. This is the latest major version (v1.x) from homarr-labs with improved architecture and features. Note: This version uses a different data structure and requires SECRET_ENCRYPTION_KEY. Not compatible with legacy Homarr (v0.x) data without migration.
